fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- During the day, guess a player's role. If you're correct, you immediately swap roles with them and they cannot use any abilities from this role that day. They are notified a Counter-Claim cc'd them.
- Twice per game, use the above ability but guess a player's faction instead. Will use a charge on fail.
- 4 times per game, wear a bulletproof vest at night to gain temporary Basic defense.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Ability uses left transfer between each player who receives this role. If someone uses 4 vests and swaps, the next person will not have any vests.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Become a different role before you die or before the end of the game. If you have this role when the game ends or you die, you lose.
